thread.title_full: roop bhinder: These Ex-Roadies Contestants are all set to marry - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: roop bhinder: These Ex-Roadies Contestants are all set to marry
text:
Mohit Saggar and Roop Bhinder , two popular contestants from Season 8 of MTV Roadies , are all set to tie the knot.
Karan Kundrra slaps a 'Roadies' contestant MTV Roadies Rising, the fourteenth season of the adventure reality show MTV Roadies, is on its way and it's going to be bigger and better.
The couple got engaged a few days ago and announced it officially on their social media account. Posting a pretty picture of theirs and making it official, Mohit wrote on his Instagram account: And so he slipped the ring onto her finger, she knew she was the happiest girl alive!!
And so he slipped the ring onto her finger, she knew she was the happiest girl alive!!
A post shared by Mohit Saggar (@mohitsaggar) on Feb 16, 2017 at 11:27am PST
Take a look at some of the most gorgeous snaps of the duo:
The Game will always be on..
A post shared by Mohit Saggar (@mohitsaggar) on Dec 5, 2016 at 11:18pm PST
We Decided on Forever ☺️
A post shared by Mohit Saggar (@mohitsaggar) on Feb 16, 2017 at 11:28am PST
I have dreamed that your arms are lovely And I have dreamed what a joy you'll be I have dreamed every word you'll whisper When you're close, close to me. #love #fantasy #madeforlife #magic #adventure
A post shared by Mohit Saggar (@mohitsaggar) on Dec 7, 2016 at 9:48am PST
Here's wishing them a great life ahead!
WATCH: MTV Roadies
